talkDataSet.name: Evilmage
talkDataSet.dialogue: If there were a little more…

talkDataSet.name: Evilmage
talkDataSet.dialogue: If there were a little more…!!!!!

talkDataSet.name: Evilmage

talkDataSet.name: Commander
talkDataSet.dialogue: Do you guys live without thinking?

talkDataSet.name: Commander
talkDataSet.dialogue: Your greed could have make our kingdom doomed!!

talkDataSet.name: Commander
talkDataSet.dialogue: What is it fucking sword guy?

selectionData.yes: Why did he attack our kingdom with monsters? He is a human.
